meanings.definition: A type of tropical plant with long, sword-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The dracenas in the garden added a touch of green to the landscape.
meanings.sent2: I watered the dracenas in the living room to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the dracenas, thinking they were giant swords.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed behind her like the leaves of dracenas in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The dracenas stood tall and proud, their leaves shimmering in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'dracena', referring to multiple plants of this type.
meanings.sent1: We bought several dracenas to decorate the office space.
meanings.sent2: The dracenas in the corner brightened up the room with their vibrant green color.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners had a competition to see who could grow the tallest dracenas.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with dracenas, creating a sea of green in the landscape.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the shadows of the dracenas stretched across the yard.
